duties_responsibilities.duty: Respond to questions concerning risk management that may arise.
Conduct risk assessments and participate in root cause analysis as needed.
Review event reports on a daily basis and assist in event investigations.
Conduct educational sessions on risk issues for the various entities as necessary.
Investigate allegations of inappropriate treatment/care which result in injury (or alleged injury) to a patient/visitor.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s Degree in Clinical background and experience. A legal background is preferred.
